resources.string: Members of the IceBridge team visited a colony of Magellanic penguins near Punta Arenas on a no-flight day. NASA\'s Operation IceBridge is an airborne science mission to study Earth\'s polar ice.Members of the IceBridge team visited a colony of Magellanic penguins near Punta Arenas on a no-flight day.
